'''Secret Spear of Wangsheng''' is [[Hu Tao]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*{{TalentNote|conversion|character=Hu Tao|talent=Guide to Afterlife|Pyro|9}} Additionally, her Charged Attacks will apply the Blood Blossom effect to enemies it hits. Opponents affected by a Blood Blossom will receive continuous {{Color|Pyro DMG}} every 4 seconds until the effect wears off.
